function showBody()
{
	$("#body").html("正在提取...");
	$.ajax({
		url:'{$$contextPath$$}/ajax_thread_showBodyByPrice.action?tid={$$tid$$}',
		type: 'post',
		success:function(data){

		 $("#body").html(data);
		}
	 });
}
</script>

<script type='text/javascript'> 
var purl,encryptedParmStr;
encryptedParmStr();
mediaUrl();
function encryptedParmStr(){
	$.ajax({
		url:'{$$contextPath$$}/ajax_thread_encryptedParmStr.action?tid={$$tid$$}',
		type: 'post',
		async:false,
		success:function(data){
		var response = data;
		encryptedParmStr=response;
		}
	 });
 
}
function mediaUrl(){
	$.ajax({
		url:'{$$contextPath$$}/ajax_thread_mediaUrl.action?tid={$$tid$$}&encryptedParmStr='+encryptedParmStr,
		type: 'post',
		async:false,
		success:function(data){
		var response = data;
		purl=response;
		}
	 });
 
}
</script>
{$$playerMainBody$$}

<style type="text/css">
body,ul,ol,li,p,form,img,div,dl,dt,dd{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;}
body,html{ height:100%; font-size:12px; font-family:"宋体",Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;}
body{ background:#fff;}
</style>
</head>
<body>
<script type='text/javascript'> 
var purl,encryptedParmStr;
encryptedParmStr();
mediaUrl();
function encryptedParmStr(){
	$.ajax({
		url:'{$$contextPath$$}/ajax_attachment_encryptedParmStr.action?id={$$attaId$$}',
		type: 'post',
		async:false,
		success:function(data){
		var response = data;
		encryptedParmStr=response;
		}
	 });
 
}
function mediaUrl(){
	$.ajax({
		url:'{$$contextPath$$}/ajax_attachment_mediaUrl.action?id={$$attaId$$}&encryptedParmStr='+encryptedParmStr,
		type: 'post',
		async:false,
		success:function(data){
		var response = data;
		purl=response;
		}
	 });
 
}
</script>
{$$playerMainBody$$}
</body>

<style  type="text/css">
/*全局s*/
body,ul,ol,li,p,form,table,td,img,div,dl,dt,dd{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;}
body{background:#fff;color:#333;font-size:12px;font-family: "微软雅黑", "宋体";}
pre {
width:680px;
display: block;
overflow: auto;
background: #f4f4f4;
padding: 5px 10px;
border: 1px solid #eee;
word-wrap:break-word; /* Internet Explorer 5.5+ */ 
white-space: pre-wrap; /* Firefox */
}
ul,ol,li{list-style-type:none;}
li{list-style-type:none;background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/libg.gif) no-repeat;line-height:1.5em; padding-left:1em; color:#aaa;}
a:link{text-decoration : none ;color : #333 ;} 
a:visited{text-decoration : none ;color : #333 ;} 
a:hover{text-decoration : none ;color : #f00 ;} 
a:active{text-decoration : none ;color : #333 ;}
.cle{ clear:both; font-size:0px;}
/*全局o*/
/*顶部s*/
.top{ height:53px; background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/bgxr.jpg);}
.topcontainer{ margin:0 auto; width:910px; padding:5px 0 0 50px;}
.toplogo{ height:38px; width:111px; background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/bg.jpg) no-repeat 0 0; float:left;}
.toplogin{ float:right; width:124px; height:37px; background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/bg.jpg) no-repeat -111px 0px; margin:2px 60px 0 0; display:inline; padding:4px 0 0 8px;}
.toplogining{float:right; width:180px; height:37px; margin:2px 60px 0 0; display:inline; padding:17px 0 0 8px;}
.toplogining a:link{text-decoration : none ;color : #fc0 ;} 
.toplogining a:visited{text-decoration : none ;color : #fc0 ;} 
.toplogining a:hover{text-decoration : none ;color : #f00 ;} 
.toplogining a:active{text-decoration : none ;color : #fc0 ;}

.main{width:960px; margin:0 auto;}
.header{ margin-top:3px;}
.banner{ height:217px; background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/banner.jpg);}
.nav{}
.nav_l{ float:left; width:9px; font-size:0px; background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/bg.jpg) no-repeat -243px 0px; height:41px;}
.nav_m{ float:left; width:928px; height:41px; background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/bgxr.jpg) repeat-x 0px -53px; text-align:center;padding-left:14px;}
.nav_m a{display:inline-block;width:83px; height:41px;float:left;}
.nav_a1{ background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/bg.jpg) no-repeat 0px -41px; }
.nav_a1:hover{ background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/bg.jpg) no-repeat -83px -41px;}

.footer_m_l{ float:left; height:17px; width:240px; margin:20px 0 0 40px; display:inline; background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/site/default/images/bg.jpg) no-repeat -320px 0px; padding:22px 0 0 110px; color:#fff;}
